name: Jab-Cross
instructions: Start in orthodox stance with left foot forward
Throw a quick jab with your left hand
Immediately follow with a cross (straight right)
Keep your guard up and return to stance
Focus on speed and accuracy
tips: Keep your chin down and eyes up
Rotate your hips for more power
Don't drop your hands after punching

name: Teep (Push Kick)
instructions: Lift your knee straight up towards your chest
Extend your leg straight out
Strike with the ball of your foot
Push through the target
Return leg quickly to starting position
tips: Keep your balance on the standing leg
Aim for the solar plexus or stomach
commonMistakes: Striking with toes instead of ball of foot

name: Roundhouse Kick
instructions: Pivot on your standing foot
Lift your knee up and across your body
Snap your shin through the target
Strike with your shin, not your foot
Follow through and return to stance
tips: Keep your hands up for balance
Aim for the thigh, body, or head
commonMistakes: Striking with the foot instead of shin

name: Horizontal Elbow
instructions: Bring your elbow across your body horizontally
Keep your fist close to your ear
Strike with the sharp point of your elbow
Rotate your body for maximum power
Keep opposite hand up for defense
tips: Keep the elbow strike tight and compact
Target the jaw, temple, or ribs

name: Straight Knee
instructions: Drive your knee straight up
Keep your shin vertical
Strike with the top of your knee cap
Pull your opponent down while kneeing up
Keep your balance on the standing leg
tips: Use your arms to control distance

name: Jab-Cross-Hook
instructions: Start with jab-cross combo
After the cross, throw a left hook
Keep your elbow parallel to the floor
Rotate your body into the hook
Return to guard position
